description:
冰雪皇后 Frozen (2013)

导演: 克里斯·巴克 / Jennifer Lee
编剧: 安徒生 / Jennifer Lee
主演: 克里斯汀·贝尔 / 伊迪娜·门泽尔 / 乔纳森·格罗夫 / 乔什·盖德
类型: 动画
语言: 英语
上映日期: 2013(中国大陆) / 2013-11-27(美国)

预告片：

剧情简介：

本片故事基于《安徒生童话》改编而成，讲述了公主安娜（克里斯汀·贝尔配音）和喜爱冒险的山民克里斯托弗（乔纳森·格罗夫配音）以及一只驯鹿、会说话的雪人一起踏上北上冒险的路程，而他们冒险之旅的目的是为了解除安娜的姐姐——冷酷的白雪皇后（伊迪娜·门泽尔配音）给她下的，让她的王国陷入永恒寒冬的诅咒。

Frozen is an upcoming American 3D computer animated musical-fantasy film produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures. It is loosely based on Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tale The Snow Queen. It will be the 53rd animated feature in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series. The film will feature the voices of Kristen Bell as Anna, Idina Menzel as Elsa the Snow Queen, and Jonathan Groff as Kristoff, in speaking as well as singing roles. The film is currently scheduled to be released on November 27, 2013.

title: 迪士尼动画《冰雪皇后》首曝预告 驯鹿雪人搞笑先行（新片速递）

description:
沪江英乐：欧洲歌唱大赛新科冠军、丹麦20岁新星Emmelie de Forest伤感新单《Only Teardrops》。英国皇室血统的精灵女声Emmelie De Forest的完美演绎，加上优美的旋律伴着悠扬的风笛声及强劲鼓点，带给你非一般的震撼视听效果。现在发现丹麦真是人才辈出，这唱歌的感觉着实不错~~

【Emmelie de Forest伤感新单《Only Teardrops》】

歌词：

The sky is red tonight
We’re on the edge tonight
No shooting star to guide us

Eye for an eye, why tear each other apart?
Please tell me why, why do we make it so?
I look at us now, we only got ourselves to blame
It’s such a shame

How many times can we win and lose?
How many times can we break the rules between us?
Only teardrops

How many times do we have to fight?
How many times till we get it right between us?
Only teardrops

So come and face me now
Here on this stage tonight
Let’s leave the past behind us

Eye for an eye, why tear each other apart?
Please tell me why, why do we make it so?
I look at us now, we only got ourselves to blame
It’s such a shame

Tell me
How many times can we win and lose?
How many times can we break the rules between us?
Only teardrops

How many times do we have to fight?
How many times till we get it right between us?
Only teardrops

Only teardrops
(Tell me now) What’s come between us? What’s come between us?

How many times can we win and lose?
How many times can we break the rules between us?
Only teardrops

How many times do we have to fight?
How many times till we get it right between us?
Only teardrops, only teardrops

Only teardrops
Only teardrops

How many times can we break the rules between us?
Only teardrops

How many times do we have to fight?
How many times till we get it right between us?
Only teardrops
